duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform automotive services and repairs in compliance with company procedures and guidelines.
Conduct inspections on vehicles and communicate mechanical diagnoses to non-mechanical individuals.
Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the service center and equipment, and review maintenance/operating efficiency of tools and store equipment.
Drive company vehicles to drop off and pick up automotive parts, and perform store deliveries.
Perform tire services, oil changes, alignments, brake services, and fluid services with physical demands.
Analyzes market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 2 years of automotive repair experience, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field, or demonstrated skills via third-party certificates/assessment.

A.S.E certification in at least one of A1-A8 is preferred. Will accept equivalent external qualifications or training certifications. (New Hires with external similar qualification/certification will have up to 2 years of employment to comply.)
